title: Yesterday's Promise
description: A high-stakes poker game, first meets, a dog rescue, loves lost and rekindled, and life-altering choices fill the history of Spencer, Colorado. Discover the challenges faced in these heartwarming stories crafted by the multi-author group who brings you romantic fiction at its finest in The Aspen Gold Series.This collection includes:The Card Game by M.A.JewellSome Days Are Diamonds by Lizzie StarrAh, Venice by Debra HinesFirst Chance by Donna KayeRacing Hearts by Bernadette JonesRescue Me by Cheryl St.John
author: Cheryl St. John
